content.en: MIMO Optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize various aspects of massive MIMO (Multiple-Input Multiple-Output) systems, which are wireless communication systems with multiple antennas. These algorithms are being used to improve resource allocation, power control, interference suppression, and beamforming in order to enhance system performance and efficiency. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to maximize data transmission rates, minimize power consumption, and improve the overall quality of service in massive MIMO networks.
content.da: MIMO-optimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere forskellige aspekter af massive MIMO (Multiple-Input Multiple-Output) systemer, som er trådløse kommunikationssystemer med flere antenner. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at forbedre ressourceallokering, effektkontrol, interferensundertrykkelse og beamforming for at forbedre systemets ydeevne og effektivitet. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at maksimere dataoverførselshastigheder, minimere strømforbrug og forbedre den overordnede kvalitet af servicen i massive MIMO-netværk.
